name: Soulstand
description:
You are a brave warrior who is making his last stand. How long will you survive?

Soulstand is an avoid-’em-up browser game where you must defend the soul of a fallen knight by smashing away evil spirits that emerge from four directions. The spirits gradually emerge faster and the game is over when the soul’s health reaches zero.

Key features:

  • Combo your hits and smash spirits to bits by using keyboard or touch controls.
  • Get alive from the dead and beat your own high score by putting your reaction speed to the test.
  • Keep your mind sharp with lunch break -sized sessions of wreaking havoc!

2018 © Avartava
